label: 1/288 Jarlskog spiral twist
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: 1/288 Jarlskog spiral twist. Validation: Matter > antimatter preference
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288
b3 = reg.b3                      # 24

# CP violation phase: Jarlskog invariant from 1/288 twist
# Matter-antimatter asymmetry emerges from root lattice chirality
J_scale = 1.0 / roots            # ~3.5e-3 fundamental twist
J_experimental = 3.08e-5         # Measured Jarlskog invariant
twist_enhancement = b3 / roots   # Chiral enhancement factor
verified = J_scale > J_experimental  # PM predicts larger fundamental scale
